title: Sergio Vega from Quicksand
itunes:title: Sergio Vega from Quicksand
description:
This week I have one of my favorite bass players around, Sergio Vega from Quicksand. He's an incredibly open and honest dude that has created some of the best tones in the game. We get into his musical upbringing, NYHC and the post-hardcore scene of the early 90's. We also chat about his time playing with Deftones and more! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
